import { useEffect } from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' import { useContext } from 'react' import Cards from './Cards' import "./category.css" import axios from "./axios" import { NewsContext } from './NewsContext' import CategoryCard from './CategoryCard' function Category(props) { const [data,setData]=useState(); const apiKey="2c775f4e4c2a4c2590c3821a0b546db4"; useEffect(()=>{ axios.get(`${props.type}` ).then(response=>setData(response.data)) .catch(error=>console(error)); console.log(data) },[]) return (
